description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.XrBOn1MueVB4u5sV]{Nanocyte Knack}

When using your @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.LLNp1urkLncOxgsb]{Gear Array (Ex)} to create a major form, you can spend a @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.vh6n0Ad3lamOJXpV]{Nanite Surge (Ex)} as part of the action to have the formâ€™s composition mimic certain special materials such as starmetals. You can form a melee weapon or armor from the material or alter and automatically load a set of suitable ammunition incorporating an amount of special materials, up to a maximum value of up to 250 credits per nanocyte level. Special materials must be chosen from the following list: abysiumAR, adamantine alloy, cold iron, djezetAR, horacalcumAR, inubrixAR, noqualAR, siccatiteAR, and silver.
